'''Dorothy Grace Wood''' (n√©e Mountain), called "'''Ding'''" by close relatives, was a cousin of [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] (her mother was [[Grace Mountain]]). As a child, J.R.R. Tolkien spent several holidays with his paternal aunt in [[Wikipedia:Northumberland|Northumberland]], and in later life he renewed the friendship with Dorothy.<ref>''[[Sotheby's English Literature, History, Children's Books, Illustrations and Photographs 8 July 2004]]'', p. 232</ref><ref>{{CG|RG}}, p. 1009</ref>
